articles.title: Watch: Pakistan Hockey Team Arrives In India Via Attari-Wagah Border For Asian Champions Trophy - NDTV Sports
articles.description: India and Pakistan are the joint most successful teams in this tournament's history.
articles.content: Pakistan Hockey team on Monday arrived in India via the Attari-Wagah border to participate in the upcoming Asian Champions Trophy Hockey scheduled to begin on Thursday. The Men's Asian Champions Trop… [+1564 chars]
